name: bilious
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to an illness, caused by too much bile, that can cause vomiting: She suffered from bilious attacks.
formal If someone is bilious, they are always in a bad mood: a bilious old man
extremely unpleasant: His shirt was a bilious shade of green.
